definition: see 禪城區|禅城区[Chan2 cheng2 qu1]
dhyana (Sanskrit)/Zen/meditation (Buddhism)
to abdicate
city walls/city/town/CL:座[zuo4],道[dao4],個|个[ge4]
Chancheng district, Foshan city, Guangdong

sentences.english: Saw such a clear explanation of a district boundary between Chancheng and Nanhai for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 首次发现南海与禅城之间有这么清晰的分界说明。

sentences.english: Our company benefits Chancheng District in Foshan City, 2 King Street, No 21.
sentences.chinese: 我公司位于佛山禅城区惠景城二街21号。

sentences.english: And I hope my job can be in Chancheng, Foshan.
sentences.chinese: 并且我希望我的工作在佛山禅城区内。
